creation(tag=meme_CraftworldPrimacy) ->[deity0_name] created all of nature, and gave it to man as a gift, to serve man and his purposes forever.
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_CraftworldPrimacy) ->The people fought with the beasts of the forest, and [deity0_name] saw their struggle, and gave them weapons to control nature.

intro(tag=meme_CraftworldPrimacy) ->The first crashlanded settlers of the [place_summary] [place_name] were beset by manhunting [Animal]s. [deity0_name] intervened, slaying the beasts and making clear [deity0_possessive] preference for the human race.

conflict(tag=meme_CraftworldPrimacy) ->An anti-human [foeLeader] made an edict giving some equal rights to both animals and humans. [deity0_name] wept as the [memberNamePlural] were forced to give their rights to [Animal]s and [Animal]s.

founderJoin(tag=meme_CraftworldPrimacy) ->A [place_job] named [founderName] founded the now-famous xeno-zoo on [place_name]. [founder_pronoun] used animal slaughter performances to teach visitors about [deity0_name]'s desire for humanity to rule nature.

victory(tag=meme_CraftworldPrimacy) ->Because of [founderName]'s actions, the [foeLeader]'s [foeSoldiers] saw [deity0_name]'s truth. They celebrated their shared humanity with the [memberNamePlural] and banished the [foeLeader] to live in the wilderness like an animal.
setup(tag=meme_CraftworldPrimacy) ->[founderName] built a colony on a green world, spreading the dominion of humanity over every field and forest.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_CraftworldPrimacy) ->Once, [founderName] saw a dog growl at a boy. [founder_pronoun] ordered the dog killed on the spot.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_CraftworldPrimacy) ->I visited a well-run farm full of healthy animals and thriving crops. Beside it was a forest in its natural state, gnarled and vicious. It was obvious that
lesson(tag=meme_CraftworldPrimacy) ->human beings alone are what give meaning to the universe
lesson(tag=meme_CraftworldPrimacy) ->nature is an endless frenzy of immoral destruction, and humans are the solution
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_CraftworldPrimacy) ->If the contest is survival of the fittest, then we have clearly won.
archistBasis(tag=meme_CraftworldPrimacy) ->Archotechs are machines of vast will and power, but only humanity could create them.
archistFact(tag=meme_CraftworldPrimacy) ->Humans are the device-makers, and the archotechs are their devices.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_CraftworldPrimacy) ->[inTheEnd], by observing humanity, the archotechs will finally understand their purpose, and lift confident humanity up to rule them.
animistFact(tag=meme_CraftworldPrimacy) ->Nature's animals are the spirits of slaves, and demand to be taken into service.
